name: Fifi Cooper
description: '''Refilwe Boingotlo Moeketsi''' (born 24 October 1991), known professionally as '''Fifi Cooper''' is a [[South African people|South African]] recording artist. Fifi Cooper started her music career as an [[Rhythm and blues|R&B]] singer before her musical versatility saw her release her breakthrough rap single "Chechela Morago" in 2010. In 2015, she released her award-winning debut studio album ''[[20FIFI]]''.
